text:
Background
ESRS S1-6 paragraph 50 (f) requires undertakings to disclose: ‘a cross-reference of the information
reported under (a) above to the most representative number in the financial statements.’
ESRS S1-6 paragraph 50 (a) requests the ‘total number of employees by head count and
breakdowns by gender and by country for countries in which the undertaking has 50 or more
employees representing at least 10% of its total number of employees.’
